name: Hegemony III: Clash of the Ancients
summary: Command armies, manage resources, and build an empire in this real-time strategy wargame from Longbow Games. Will Rome fulfil its destiny to rule the ancient world or will history be rewritten to forge a new Etruscan, Gallic, or Greek hegemony!
info:
• 发行日期: 2015年8月26日
  • 开发商: Longbow Games
